title: paragraph (l) of section 5 of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 

(Commencement) (No. 3) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic road act 2023 (commencement) (no 3) order 2023

title: paragraph (l) of section 5 of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of
heading: 2. The 30th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which
text_raw:
2. The 30th day of November 2023 is appointed as the day on which 
paragraph (l) of section 5 of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 
2023) shall come into operation, insofar as it relates to the following provisions 
of section 56A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961): 

(a) 

subsection (7)(c), and 

(b) 

subsections (8) to (10). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 November, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [585] 3
